alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:30PM CDT until August 03 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONROE...NORTHWESTERN RANDOLPH...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHERN STE. GENEVIEVE AND NORTHWESTERN ST. FRANCOIS COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Olympian Village, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Festus, De Soto, Crystal City, Ste. Genevieve, Hillsboro, Olympian Village, Bloomsdale, Rocky Ridge, Prairie Du Rocher, Fults, Hematite, Renault, Kellogg, Ames, Blackwell, Victoria, Chalfin Bridge, Valles Mill, French Village and Kidd. This also includes Felix Valle House State Park. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 150 and 175. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
